title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Oct 11 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Oct 11 2022
description:
With four weeks to go until midterms, gambling money pours in on Republicans to win House and Senate. Clay reminds this still means we have to vote -- and get all our friends and family to vote. Clay and Buck say it's awful PA Senate contender Fetterman had a stroke in May, but he can't say "Biden" and is the worst candidate in memory put forth for an election. Dems getting nervous about New York governor race, expert audio clip warns it could be closer than people think. Other deep blue states, like Oregon, could see upsets. Vance trounces Ryan in Ohio senate debate. Buck talks about his Dem analyst friend's important comment about Ryan and says, "Yes, I have friends on both sides, and I listen. But I don't let them peek that far into our tent." Big Pharma and Democrats still pushing covid shots despite lack of effectiveness and mounting side effects.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
